name: Realm of Holes
description:
The realm of holes is a mysterious place, with mysterious holes. Go on a journey and explore the world of holes for its secrets. Warp through space and the confusing reality in this journey. Will you find the truth behind this realm? Will you be able to change the outcome of the world?

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys and/or Space

Note:

If you experience lag, enable "Use hardware acceleration when available"in your browser settings.

Extra Tips:
  • If you press A and D (or Left and Right) and W (or Jump/Up), you will jump straight up and higher compared to normal jumps.
  • It is possible to do wall jumps, though not necessary to complete the game. Performing wall jumps is difficult and is just an extra feature.
Hints and Secrets:
  • If you keep moving in the darkness, you may find more secrets.
  • The secret object is hidden on the fourth level.
Other Infomation:

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/cracked-code.font
